title: Peter Apfelbaum and the Hieroglyphics Ensemble - Signs of Life
description:
[i]Exotic Jazz is there such a thing?  Some of these songs are certainly exotic.  Some are dark and haunting.  Big Papi scanned two inside cover images which is rare so check them out.  Check out Ms Stone and all her beauty.  Check out those incredible lyrics.  Wow.  Just wow.  Everybody say wow.

Also, Big Papi is using a new image site.  If you click images two and three it will take you there.  Props to SaM.

- Big Papi[/i]
